Package jakarta.nosql.mapping.document

Interface DocumentQueryMapper.DocumentMapperWhere

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DocumentQueryMapper.DocumentMapperQueryBuild
    Enclosing interface:
    DocumentQueryMapper
    public static interface DocumentQueryMapper.DocumentMapperWhere
extends DocumentQueryMapper.DocumentMapperQueryBuild
    The Document Where whose define the condition in the query.

        DocumentQueryMapper.DocumentMapperNameCondition and​(String name)
        Starts a new condition in the select using DocumentCondition.and(jakarta.nosql.document.DocumentCondition)
        Parameters:
        name - a condition to be added
        Returns:
        the same DocumentQueryMapper.DocumentMapperNameCondition with the condition appended
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when condition is null
